
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52204148">
<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 曦月 于 2025-1-16 20:47 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
<font style="font-size:20px"><font style="font-size:14px"><font style="font-size:20px"><strong>最先说明：本帖仅为单纯教程，里面所牵涉的相关文件，需自行鉴别下载</strong></font><font style="font-size:20px"><strong>。</strong></font></font></font><br>
<br>
<strong><font size="3"><strong>PS：</strong><strong>来了来了来了 ，录制视频太难了，完全没经验----</strong></font></strong><a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1enwVe9EhG/?share_source=copy_web&amp;vd_source=9282a6a3d8064f522b3d50c496d4cd00" target="_blank"><font size="4">实现PotPlayer字幕实时翻译，喂饭式</font><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">视频</font></font><font size="4">教程</font></a><br>
<br>
<font style="font-size:20px">&nbsp; &nbsp; </font><font size="5">先来个效果图，</font><font size="5"><a href="https://www.52pojie.cn/thread-1998989-1-1.html" target="_blank"><font color="#ff0000">语音转字幕</font></a></font><font size="5"> </font><font size="5">和</font><font size="5"> </font><font color="#ff0000"><font size="5">字幕实时翻译</font></font><font size="5"> </font><font size="5">两个功能结合起来</font><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<font style="font-size:20px">效果谁用谁知道</font><br>
<font style="font-size:14px"><br>
</font><br>
<font style="font-size:14px">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;原视频</font><br>
<img id="aimg_J04o7" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826ab9d0e0a243d4f36d0d.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826ab9d0e0a243d4f36d0d.png"><br>
<br>
<font style="font-size:14px">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;结合效果</font><br>
<img id="aimg_FMEWp" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/678270ead0e0a243d4f36f14.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/678270ead0e0a243d4f36f14.png"><br>
<br>
<strong><font size="3">PotPlayer最新版本，AI实时翻译字幕</font></strong><font size="3"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="3">一、字幕实时翻译介绍</font><br>
<br>
字幕实时翻译功能，分为 <font color="#ff0000">云端API</font> 调用 和 <font color="#ff0000">本地部署</font> 调用两种方式<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 如果可以的话，个人建议使用本地部署调用方式<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;为什么建议使用这种方式<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;因为这种方式数据不需要上传云端翻译，可以直接本地翻译（离线也可用），一定程度上保证了数据的安全性<br>
<br>
<font size="3">二、功能的实现过程</font><br>
<br>
<font color="#ff0000">第一种：</font>云端API 调用<br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 打开PotPlayer软件<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;点击&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">右键</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">实时字幕翻译</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff00">实时字幕翻译设置</font><br>
<img id="aimg_iqY92" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eaad0e0a243d4f36e60.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eaad0e0a243d4f36e60.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 实时字幕翻译设置操作<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;在弹出的 <font color="#ff0000">实时字幕翻译</font> 设置界面<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;其中 <font color="#ff0000">使用条件</font>、<font color="#ff0000">自定义语言</font>（能够选择的前提下）、<font color="#ff0000">翻译位置</font> 等内容，根据个人喜好选择<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 翻译引擎选择 <font color="#ff0000">Google translate</font><br>
<img id="aimg_LiKQj" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eaad0e0a243d4f36e61.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eaad0e0a243d4f36e61.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 为什么选择 <font color="#ff0000">Google translate</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;是因为这一个配置最简单，因为目前不需要去申请 <font color="#ff0000">API key</font>，只需要有可以访问的网络就可以直接翻译<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;如果网络不能访问，则选择其他几个翻译引擎，不过需要去官网申请 <font color="#ff00">API key</font> 等参数<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 其他自带翻译引擎，配置设置操作同 <font color="#ff00">Google translate</font> ，只是选择后需要点击 <font color="#ff0000">账户设置</font> ，填写相应的 <font color="#ff00">API key</font> 等数据，填写好后点击 <font color="#ff0000">确定</font> 保存<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;如何申请 <font color="#ff00">API key</font> ，这里不细说，官网地址如下，具体申请方法度一下<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Bing Key：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://azure.microsoft.com/" target="_blank">https://azure.microsoft.com</a><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Deepl key：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://deepl.com/" target="_blank">https://deepl.com</a><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Naver papago(NMT) key：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://papago.naver.com/" target="_blank">https://papago.naver.com</a><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Yandex key：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://www.yandex.com/" target="_blank">https://www.yandex.com</a><br>
<img id="aimg_itYa8" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eaad0e0a243d4f36e62.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eaad0e0a243d4f36e62.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 最后填写好 <font color="#ff00">账户设置</font> 后，记得点击 确定 保存配置<br>
<img id="aimg_hHzEG" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eaad0e0a243d4f36e63.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eaad0e0a243d4f36e63.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 云端 API 调用方式到此结束，主打一个会用即可，具体翻译效果自行操作<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;不知道是由于写教程，对教学视频翻译多了，或者是其他的原因，导致出现重大问题<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;在准备截翻译效果图的时候，发现翻译内容变成乱码了，换了两个平台都是一样的，晚点再去筛查原因，所以这里没有效果图<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 再说一次，建议用本地部署！！！建议用本地部署！！！建议用本地部署！！！<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;本地直接翻译，数据不用上传云端再翻译，离线都可以用<br>
<br>
<font color="#ff0000">第二种：</font>本地部署调用<br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 先下载安装 Ollama 软件<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;打开Ollama官网：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://ollama.com/" target="_blank">https://ollama.com/</a><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;二选一点击 <font color="#ff0000">Download</font> ，自动跳转至下载界面<br>
<img id="aimg_QlZ34" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eaad0e0a243d4f36e64.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eaad0e0a243d4f36e64.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 下载符合自己系统的软件版本<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;因为是Win系统，所以下载的Win版本，成功下载后双击安装包，正常安装软件即可<br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<img id="aimg_r4RR5" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eb1d0e0a243d4f36e66.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eb1d0e0a243d4f36e66.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 安装完成后，打开 命令提示符(cmd) 面板，输入 "<font color="#ff0000">ollama -v</font>" 命令，检测是否成功安装<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;安装成功会提示软件版本号<br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<img id="aimg_oY2Yt" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826fbdd0e0a243d4f36eb6.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826fbdd0e0a243d4f36eb6.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 接着在 Ollama 官网，点击 <font color="#ff0000">Models</font> 获取相应模型<br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<img id="aimg_uc613" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826fbdd0e0a243d4f36eb7.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826fbdd0e0a243d4f36eb7.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 进入 <font color="#ff00">Models </font>后，可以看到很多模型<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;输入 <font color="#ff0000">qwen2.5</font> ，本教程用 千问模型 <br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<img id="aimg_ZY6z7" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826fbdd0e0a243d4f36ebd.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826fbdd0e0a243d4f36ebd.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 点击对应模型，进入模型介绍界面，选择对应的标准，教程用的是 <font color="#ff0000">qwen2.5:7b </font>模型，根据电脑配置选择，简单说越大越吃配置<br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<img id="aimg_upjap" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eb1d0e0a243d4f36e65.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826eb1d0e0a243d4f36e65.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 选择好符合的标准后，调用下载 <font color="#ff0000">命令 </font>会 <font color="#ff0000">自行更改 </font>，然后 <font color="#ff0000">复制 </font>更改后的 <font color="#ff0000">命令</font><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<img id="aimg_Mg3GI" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826fbdd0e0a243d4f36ebe.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826fbdd0e0a243d4f36ebe.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 打开命令符面板，粘贴复制的 "<font color="#ff0000">ollama run qwen2.5:7b</font>" 命令，回车下载对应模型<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;等待模型下载完毕，因为已经下载过<font color="#ff0000">7b</font>的模型，教程演示下载的是<font color="#ff0000">0.5b</font>模型<br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<img id="aimg_Ky6Ze" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826fbdd0e0a243d4f36ebf.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826fbdd0e0a243d4f36ebf.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 成功下载后，会提示 <font color="#ff0000">success</font> ，以及可以输入文字进行对话交流，比如 你好 <br>
<img id="aimg_ps82d" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826ec0d0e0a243d4f36e74.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826ec0d0e0a243d4f36e74.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 关闭面板，重新打开输入 "<font color="#ff0000">ollama list</font>"&nbsp;&nbsp;命令，可以查看所有下载的模型<br>
<img id="aimg_bWAwr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826ec0d0e0a243d4f36e75.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826ec0d0e0a243d4f36e75.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 模型保存位置：C:\Users\用户名\.ollama\models\blobs<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;如何更改保存位置，本教程不做详细描述，先学会用，再去修改<br>
<img id="aimg_BFqPT" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826ec0d0e0a243d4f36e76.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826ec0d0e0a243d4f36e76.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 重新打开 命令提示符 面板，输入"<font color="#ff0000">ollama serve</font>" 命令连接（双击软件也可启动，如打不开可用命令启动）<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;如果连接失败，检查是否已经有打开的 ollama 程序进程<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;关闭所有相关进程后再次打开面板，输入"<font color="#ff0000">ollama serve</font>" 命令，出现一长串内容，即表示启动成功，如图<br>
<img id="aimg_x71r2" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826ec9d0e0a243d4f36e79.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67826ec9d0e0a243d4f36e79.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 在 PotPlayer 软件的 <font color="#ff0000">实时字幕翻译设置</font> 界面，点击 <font color="#ff0000">打开文件夹</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;或者手动找到并打开PotPlayer\Extension\Subtitle\Translate文件夹<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;下载以下文件并解压，将解压文件放入上述文件夹中，其中.as是借鉴大佬自行仿写的<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; Ollama 翻译插件：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://xiyue-wk.lanzout.com/if9WM2kn2bnc" target="_blank">https://xiyue-wk.lanzout.com/if9WM2kn2bnc</a><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;插件支持模型： qwen2.5:7b、qwen2.5:0.5b、qwen2.5:1.5b、qwen2.5:3b、qwen2.5:14b<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;如想用其他模型，请自行在.as文件中修改，这里不做过多的修改教学，还是那句话，先学会用，再尝试修改<br>
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 接着就是调用模型进行字幕实时翻译<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;重启PotPlayer软件<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;点击&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">右键</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">实时字幕翻译</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff00">实时字幕翻译</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 翻译引擎选择 <font color="#ff0000">Ollama translate</font><br>
<img id="aimg_wnGnp" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/678270ead0e0a243d4f36f11.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/678270ead0e0a243d4f36f11.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 选择好后，点击 <font color="#ff0000">账户设置</font> ，根据提示填写相应的 <font color="#ff00">模型名称</font> 等，填写好后点击 <font color="#ff0000">确定</font> 保存<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;模型名称就是刚刚下载的模型版本，如 qwen2.5:7b、qwen2.5:0.5b、qwen2.5:1.5b等<br>
<img id="aimg_ceRG8" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67827114d0e0a243d4f36f22.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/67827114d0e0a243d4f36f22.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 配置好账户信息后，其中 <font color="#ff0000">原始语言</font>、<font color="#ff0000">目标语言</font> 根据需求选择<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;点击 <font color="#ff0000">测试</font> ，测试是否能正常翻译<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;如果可以，点击 <font color="#ff0000">确定</font> 保存配置<br>
<img id="aimg_wyUa5" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/678270ead0e0a243d4f36f13.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/678270ead0e0a243d4f36f13.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 然后打开需要翻译的视频，可以实时翻译字幕了。<br>
<img id="aimg_iM7YA" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/678270ead0e0a243d4f36f14.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/678270ead0e0a243d4f36f14.png"><br>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
